member.name: P:CubeLibDataSource.My.Resources.Resources.persistence
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to # database can be any of the following: # ACCESS - Microsoft Access # SQLSERVER - SQL SErver # ORACLE - Oracle Server - Not yet supported database=ACCESS
# servername consist of machine name + server instance name #servername=EDWIN-PC/SQLFULL
# default admin username for SQL server is "sa" username=clearingpoint
# password should not be here or this file should be encrypted password=wack2
# set to TRUE if you want to print DEBUG Trace logs debug=TRUE
# database path override when registry key is not [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: M:CubeLibDataSource.ClearingPointException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
